title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, June 25, 2013
description: One of the people who works on big ideas at the chip-maker Intel is Genevieve Bell. She's not a software engineer, or a developer, she's an anthropologist. Bell studies everything from how people feel about their gadgets to how they use them differently around the world. And we look at a new dress made not out of gauze, but out of gaze.
teaser: One of the people who works on big ideas at the chip-maker Intel is Genevieve Bell. She's not a software engineer, or a developer, she's an anthropologist.
